text:
@PresidencyZA @CyrilRamaphosa IT IS SOOOO UNFAIR....
I suggest president and ministers must also apply for Covid19 R350, and not get their salaries during lockdown..!!! Why must they get all their Salaries while workers get nothing...!!!!WHY???
